en_title: Latest arrangements for Department of Justice services

en: To align with the special work arrangements announced by the Government to reduce the risk of the spread of COVID-19 in the community, the Department of Justice announced today (March 28) that the department will continue to provide the following basic and essential services until resumption of normal services:
Prosecutions Division - 12/F, West Wing, Justice Place, 18 Lower Albert Road, Central
Civil Division - 6/F, East Wing, Justice Place, 18 Lower Albert Road, Central
Civil Division - 8/F, West Wing, Justice Place, 18 Lower Albert Road, Central

Members of the public and the legal profession can continue to serve or submit court documents and other correspondence in matters handled by the two Divisions to the respective counters and make payments to the Shroff Office. While the documents will be processed as quickly as possible, the response time may be longer than usual.
zh: 為配合政府宣布實施的特別上班安排，以盡量減低疫情在社區擴散的風險，律政司今日（三月二十八日）宣布將繼續維持為公眾和法律界提供以下基本和必須的公共服務，直至恢復正常服務：
＊ 接待處櫃枱
刑事檢控科──中環下亞厘畢道18號律政中心西座12樓
星期一至星期五
上午九時至下午一時及下午二時至六時
民事法律科──中環下亞厘畢道18號律政中心東座6樓
星期一至星期五
上午九時至下午一時及下午二時至六時
＊ 繳費處
民事法律科──中環下亞厘畢道18號律政中心西座8樓
星期二及星期四
上午九時至下午一時及下午二時至四時三十分
公眾與法律界人士可繼續將上述兩部門處理的案件的法庭文件及其他有關書信，送達或提交至相關接待處櫃枱，以及往繳費處繳交款項。有關文件將獲盡快處理，然而回覆時間或會較以往長。
2020年3月28日（星期六）
